location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a petition, from Bujee Khanum, one of the widows of the late Aga Mahomed Behbanee, dated 26 April 1819. The petition is addressed to Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay.It is requested that two houses at Bushire, belonging to the late Aga Mahomed Behbanee, be divided into two equal shares between the widow at Bushire and the petitioner. It further requests that the property be held by the Resident at Bushire until he is able to affect its sale. It is further requested that any moveable property belonging to the petitioner be shipped to her.
